Consultation available
with flexible features and quotes
tailored to your specific needs.
PuddingOffice.title: Various
PuddingOffice.infoSystem.title: Enhanced Accessibility
PuddingOffice.infoSystem.heading: Internal Information Management System
PuddingOffice.infoSystem.description1: Employee information registration, basic information modification, and retrieval
PuddingOffice.infoSystem.description2: Clock-out system, time record/retrieval, date-specific time tracking
PuddingOffice.infoSystem.description3: Daily work report creation and modification, daily work report retrieval
PuddingOffice.customerManagement.title: Customer management with
PuddingOffice.customerManagement.heading: ease and convenience
PuddingOffice.customerManagement.descrip: Tax invoice content registration, quick retrieval, deposit history record and retrieval
Customer company information registration, company information modification, and retrieval
PuddingOffice.projectManagement.title: Increased work efficiency with
PuddingOffice.projectManagement.heading: Project Management
PuddingOffice.projectManagement.descript: Project information recording, project modification, and retrieval
Comment registration and retrieval, deposit history retrieval
PuddingStudio.title: Experience the differentiated virtual studio service of Pudding Studio that transcends space
PuddingStudio.contentDescription1: Pudding Studio provides various FX effects
PuddingStudio.techDescription1: Provides high-performance chroma key technology and real image capture board through synthesis
PuddingStudio.syncDescription1: Natural production is possible with location synchronization
PuddingStudio.syncDescription2: of real camera and virtual studio camera.
JSee.rtcPlatform: Worship platform with two-way communication using RTC technology
JSee.realTimeWorshipDescription1: Real-time worship between lecturers and worshipers is possible using RTC technology, as well as
JSee.realTimeWorshipDescription2: chat, viewing worship materials, and other functions.
JSee.checkAttendanceDescription1: You can easily check the progress rate with the easy-to-view attendance check function,
JSee.checkAttendanceDescription2: and watch missed lectures with the view more function.
JSee.watchLectureDescription1: Lecturers/pastors can upload videos, and students/worshipers can
JSee.watchLectureDescription2: take lectures while watching the uploaded videos.
DaeguContent.artMuseumDescription: You can experience Daegu Art Museum, a local-specialized content of Daegu, in the metaverse.
DaeguContent.palgongsanDescription: You can experience making a wish at Gatbawi, Palgongsan Mountain, in the metaverse.
JPit.title1: With the AI Fitness System, experience
JPit.rtcPlatform: Worship platform with two-way communication using RTC technology
JPit.homeTrainingTitle3: with an easy and convenient non-contact AI fitness system.
JPit.attendanceDescription2: use the view more feature for missed lectures
JPit.instructorModeDescription1: Select the desired instructor and use
JPit.serviceIntroductionTitle2: that allow you to customize your exercise mode according to your situation and ability
JPit.instructorModeDescription3: Receive quick feedback and correct posture coaching through real-time communication with the instructor.
JPit.aiModeDescription4: You can easily follow along by watching the video, and the AI helps maintain correct posture.
JoinVR.attendanceDescription1: Video calls (1:1 / 1:N) seminars, document meetings, etc.
JoinVR.lectureDescription1: Recording and saving meeting situations such as video, audio, board, and text
JoinVR.lectureDescription2: Building and playing meeting material DB
JoinVR.instructorModeDescription1: Chat and file transfer functions for smooth work
JoinVR.aiModeDescription1: Meeting attendance frequency, meeting creation, and
JoinVR.aiModeDescription2: Project management, attendee opinions, meeting result files
JoinVR.messengerDescription2: Document sharing function such as HTML files
JoinVR.spaceLimitDescription: VR non-contact meeting system that overcomes indirect restrictions and spatial limitations
JoinVR.communicationDescription: Live discussions and Q&A "Smooth communication in a VR environment"
JoinVR.customizeTitle: Various customization options depending on field, purpose, and number of people
JoinVR.vrRealismDescription: Realistic environment implementation with 360 photos and videos
